name: @indent/gcloud-github-webhook
description: A Node.js starter for Google Cloud Functions with Indent and GitHub.

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build:env && env-cmd -r ./.env.json functions-framework --source=lib/index.js --target=webhook
scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy indent-github-webhook --entry-point webhook --env-vars-file .env.yaml --region us-central1 --project=$GCP_PROJECT --runtime=nodejs10 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist

author: Indent Inc <open@indent.com>
